articles.description: Savita Punia replaces Rani Rampal as captain ahead of India's campaign at the 2022 FIH Hockey Women's World Cup
articles.content:
Savita Punia is revelling in the best phase of her playing career.
As a goalkeeper, she's at her peak - considered one of the best in the world at the moment. She's also captaining the India women's… [+6351 chars]
